By itself, it does not do much.



Art provided by mumpfy: https://mumpfy.myportfolio.com/

State.Author: Oakraven - arramus

State.Name: (V1) Oakraven Ammo Press

State.Description:
The (V1) Oakraven Chicken Coops mod allows players to craft a chicken coop helper of the Workbench. This can be placed as one of 4 types. It requires 2 caught chicks to be populated. Caught chicks can be found in nests of from chopped down trees.

WARNING:- This mod should only be added to a new world because it replaces the default nests.
State.Name: (V1) Oakraven Chicken Coops

State.Author: Oakraven - arramus
State.Description: (V1) Oakraven Power Things mod provides an additional set of devices to power your electrical system. Collect Rocks and Crystal in the Burnt Forest and Wasteland to craft Power Cells and Solar Cells. Add them to Oakraven Generators and Solar Arrays for greater power and more efficiency.

                            (NEW GAME NEEDED)

State.Author: Mumpfy and LittleRedSonja

This mod adds several variants of masks, hats, helmets and full body outfits, decorative blocks, lights, workbenches, witchy cauldrons, all inspired by the spooky season. Enjoy Halloween in your game like never before! Treat or Trick!
State.Name: Halloweeny

State.Author: LittleRedSonja
State.Description:
More than 140 new deco blocks, workstations, lamps, powered lights, neon lights, crops, ingredients, foods, drinks, weapons, hats, safe storage and much more, all inspired by Christmas. 

It also includes Christmas music played by musical elves, custom sounds, tweaks to some vanilla features, , world loot, air drops, game events and much more!.
State.Name: LittleRedSonja Christmas Is Coming

State.Author: LittleRedSonja

It includes custom mods for Super Charger, Light mod, Fuel Reserve mod, and Plow, but can also equip all the other mods up to 5 in total. Custom horn sound. Craftable in the workbench. The mod is for V1 or later versions of 7 days to die.

State.Author: LittleRedSonja
State.Description: This mod adds several new T3 weapons converted from T2 weapons. Keep look, animations and sounds of the T2 weapons but get upgraded stats and new features. Weapon stats are tweaked and tested to make it as balanced as possible, while keeping it fun. IT DOES NOT REPLACE THE VANILLA WEAPONS, but it adds several new weapons instead.

This is a Mod - and should be installed in your Appdata Mod Folder.  For Multiplayer, it must be installed both server and client side.  This will require generating a new Random Map.

Este lugar es la construcción mas alta del juego 

Es mi segundo prefab, es probable que encuentres algun error

Es mi primer edificio y en un futuro creare
